mapper.select:
select top ${param.topNum} p.ID, p.PERSON_NAME, p.DESCRIPTION FROM B_MD_GIFT_PERSON_INFO p
AND p.COMPANY_ID = #{param.companyId}
AND ( p.PERSON_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{param.keyword},'%') OR p.DESCRIPTION LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{param.keyword},'%') )
AND p.MARK_DELETED = 'N'
ORDER BY p.PERSON_NAME ASC, p.DESCRIPTION ASC
